workTime.title: Work Duration
workTime.text: Screen-on Time, in seconds; at least 10 sec

pauseOnRest.title: Automatic Pause
pauseOnRest.text: Automatically pauses the timer if SiYuan is not used for a long time

checkRestInterval.title: Pause Wait Time
checkRestInterval.text: Duration in seconds; if SiYuan is not used for more than this time, the timer will be automatically paused
